title: SMPD4-Related Clinical Phenotype Data
text: goal SMPD4 provide analysis ready data sets SMPD4 data. Sphingomyelin Phosphodiesterase 4 (SMPD4) type sphinogmyelinase protein encoded SMPD4 gene. Patients bi-allelic loss function variants gene associated condition known neurodevelopmental disorder microcephaly, arthrogryposis, structural brain anomalies (NEDMABA; 618622). cases exist scientific literature Magini et al. (2019) reporting 23 members 12 unrelated families. genotype-phenotype relationship NEDMABA heterogeneous aside case-reports, little data available statistical analysis. Magini et al. (2019) offer supplementary table summarised clinical phenotype data included subjects. Unfortunately data non standardised, heterogeneous largely textual based. project aims standardise process data tidy format (Wickham (2014)) analysis-ready extensible researchers better understand relationship clinical factors discovered literature.

title: SMPD4-Related Clinical Phenotype Data
text: can install development version SMPD4 GitHub :

title: SMPD4-Related Clinical Phenotype Data
code: library(SMPD4)  data("smpd4_phenotype") head(smpd4_phenotype[,1:20]) #>    id family individual deceased survival_time variant_type locus_1 locus_2 #> 1 1_1      1          1     TRUE            30   homozygote    1320      NA #> 2 1_2      1          2     TRUE            60   homozygote    1320      NA #> 3 1_3      1          3     TRUE            30   homozygote    1320      NA #> 4 1_4      1          4     TRUE          1095   homozygote    1320      NA #> 5 2_1      2          1     TRUE          2190   homozygote    1483      NA #> 6 2_2      2          2    FALSE          1825   homozygote    1483      NA #>   gender ethnicity consanguineous termination birth_gestation #> 1 female   Turkish           TRUE       FALSE              39 #> 2   male   Turkish           TRUE       FALSE              37 #> 3   male   Turkish           TRUE       FALSE              36 #> 4 female   Turkish           TRUE       FALSE              38 #> 5 female   Morocco           TRUE       FALSE              37 #> 6   male   Morocco           TRUE       FALSE              37 #>   route_vaginal_vs_c_sect birth_weight birth_ofc birth_length age_at_demise #> 1                     SVD         2175      30.5           NA            30 #> 2                      CS         1860      31.0           NA            60 #> 3                      CS         1955      30.0           NA             2 #> 4                      CS         2780      30.5           41          1095 #> 5                      CS         2045      29.0           39          2190 #> 6                      CS         2300        NA           NA            NA #>   age_at_last_follow_up microcephaly_ind #> 1                    30                1 #> 2                    60                1 #> 3                    30                1 #> 4                  1095                1 #> 5                    NA                1 #> 6                  1825                1
